price: የሰማያትና የምድር (ድልብ) መክፈቻዎች የእርሱ ብቻ ናቸው፡፡ እነዚያም በአላህ አንቀጾች የካዱት እነዚያ እነሱ ከሳሪዎቹ ናቸው፡፡
arabic: لَّهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahu maqālīdu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyāti al-lahi ulāika humu al-khāsirūna
